./frontend/src/components/ui/Card.tsx.description: ALL 5 REQUIRED CARD COMPONENTS ALREADY EXIST: Base Card, GlassCardComponent (glassmorphism), KPICard, FeatureCard, and ProjectCard. All are fully implemented with TypeScript, MUI/Emotion styling, theme integration, and actively used across 10+ pages.

./frontend/src/theme/theme.ts.description: Tech stack: React 18.2 + TypeScript + Vite + MUI v5.15.6 + Emotion. Comprehensive theme system with light/dark modes, custom component overrides, and design tokens matching DESIGN_SYSTEM.md specifications.
